Summary: A blimp that turn into a disc flying over south ocean drive (A1A) near Hallandale
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on a chair on the second floor of a 20 unit co-op. When I looked into the sky and saw an airplane dragging acord with advertisting sign at the end of the line. Looking behind the line was a circle what appeared darh brown in color and a tail flapping as it decending then turned into a disc. It was 100 to 150 feet flying east where I live. it flew over south ocean drive (A1A). then flew behind the condos building at the hallandale beach.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Hollywood
There were no other sightings in Hollywood on or around June 10th 2011
